Package it.polimi.ingsw.network

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent the lobby. in particular, it is responsible of store all the shared data for every client as the game, the reference to the thread of every other client, the number of players of the game, the nicknames of every player, if the game is started or finished. it also implements runnable to ping players

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Lobby​(int numberOfPlayers)
    this constructor create a lobby setting the number of players of the game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addClient​(ClientHandler client)
    this method adds a client to the list of the client associated with the lobby (and the game).

    this method add a nickname to the list of nicknames.
    void createGame()
    this method create a game.
    java.util.List<ClientHandler> getClients()
    this method get the list of clients.
    Game getGame()
    this method get the game from reference, so if a client have to do any action, have to call this method first

    this method return the number of players.

    this method indicates if the game is started or not.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby​(int numberOfPlayers)
      this constructor create a lobby setting the number of players of the game
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - this is the number of players of the game to set

  • Method Details

    • addClient

      public void addClient​(ClientHandler client) throws LobbyFinishedException
      this method adds a client to the list of the client associated with the lobby (and the game). this method have to be called when a client want to play a game with the same number of players of the lobby and the game isn't started yet
      Parameters:
      client - this attribute represent the client to add
      Throws:
      LobbyFinishedException - when the attribute gameIsFinished is true

    • removeClient

      public void removeClient​(ClientHandler client)
      this method remove a client from the list of clients of the lobby. in particular, this method will be called when a client disconnect during the login phase (before that the game start ), and the lobby will kick him out and continue the login phase, otherwise when the game started and a client quit, the class clientHandler have to call this method for every client of the list of clients
      Parameters:
      client - this is the client to remove

    • getGame

      public Game getGame()
      this method get the game from reference, so if a client have to do any action, have to call this method first
      Returns:
      the reference of the game associated with the lobby

    • createGame

      public void createGame()
      this method create a game. in particular, depending on the number of players, will create a single game or a multi game, setting the nicknames previously chosen and stored as attribute into this class, then sort the list of clients with the same casual order of the game, it finally set to true that the game is started

    • getNicknames

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getNicknames()
      this method get the nicknames of the players. in particular, when every player do the login have to send the nickname, that will be stored into a list into the lobby, so this method will return only the nicknames of the players that have done the login
      Returns:
      the nicknames of the players

    • addNickname

      public void addNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      this method add a nickname to the list of nicknames. in particular, every client have to send his nickname to complete the login, and, once accepted, the thread associated with the client that own a reference to the lobby will call this method to add the nickname to the list. if the nickname is the last one the server will start the initialisation phase
      Parameters:
      nickname - this is the nickname to add

    • getNumberOfPlayers

      public int getNumberOfPlayers()
      this method return the number of players. in particular, the lobby will store an integer containing the number of players decided by the first player that joined
      Returns:
      the number of players of the game

    • getClients

      public java.util.List<ClientHandler> getClients()
      this method get the list of clients. in particular, when a lobby has been created, it store a list of clients, and this method return this
      Returns:
      the list of clients that have joined the lobby

    • setGameFinished

      public void setGameFinished()
      this method set the state of the game to finished. in particular, when one of the methods of the game throws an EndGameException, this method will be called, and even if the number of clients of the lobby is empty will be called. after that, the waiting room will delete this lobby from the possible ones

    • isGameFinished

      public boolean isGameFinished()
      this method indicates if the game is finished or not. it will be called from the waiting room to delete this lobby from the possible ones when return true
      Returns:
      true if the game is finished, false otherwise

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      this method indicates if the game is started or not. in particular, when the waiting room receive a new request to join a lobby with the same number of players of this, this method will be called and if it is true, the client will be added
      Returns:
      true if the gme is started (every player did the login), false otherwise

    • ping

      public void ping()
      this method ping the clients to understand if a client crashed. in particular, it send a broadcast ping message, that should be followed with a ping response in order to stimulate the in.readLine and reset the timeout of the socket

    • startTimer

      public void startTimer()
      this method start the timer that ping every client to handle disconnections
